name: BFH_XR_AMOUNTS_BEFORE
description: This table contains the expected reimbursement amounts for PB claim lines before they were overridden by a user performing a billing activity.

columns.name: BFH_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the activity history record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: XR_BEFORE_ACTION
columns.description: Stores the expected reimbursement amounts before the invoice had its expected reimbursement reevaluated or overridden.
